UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Expression of genes encoding antimicrobial and bradykinin-related peptides in skin of the stream brown frog Rana sakuraii.
Literature.Author: Suzuki H, Iwamuro S, Ohnuma A, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H, Taylor CK, Abel PW, Conlon JM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325(MIC=25µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>50µM)
